org.apache.giraph.worker

接口 WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage

  • 所有超级接口:
    AggregatorUsage, WorkerAggregatorUsage
    所有已知实现类:
    WorkerAggregatorHandler, WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage

    public interface WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
extends WorkerAggregatorUsage
    WorkerAggregatorUsage which can be used in each of the computation threads.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void finishThreadComputation()
      Call this after thread's computation is finished, i.e. when all vertices have provided their values to aggregators

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.worker.WorkerAggregatorUsage

        aggregate

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.aggregators.AggregatorUsage

        getAggregatedValue

    • 方法详细资料

      • finishThreadComputation

        void finishThreadComputation()
        Call this after thread's computation is finished, i.e. when all vertices have provided their values to aggregators
